Maya jTools

16 May

Personal project, collection of various scripts written over the years under the single unified UI. Global menu and hotkeys assignment are provided as well. Tools are grouped by function: Channel Box Operations, Selection, Arrays, Shading, Clipboards, etc. Panels can also work in a ‘standalone’ mode, without main UI to avoid the clutter.

RView: Maya intelligent render view chooser

14 May

Problem with the current Maya “Render Image” and “IPR” buttons is that they’re bound to an old Maya Render View, while every rendering engine has it’s own RenderView now. Idea is very simple: take current renderer and just use it’s MEL or Python commands to show appropriate RenderView or start IPR. Compatible with Arnold, Octane, V-Ray, and basically any renderer …

Envexp: environment inspector

14 May

Envexp is a simple PySide tool that utilizes cross-DCC loading mechanism and can transparently work in basically all software supporting Python and Qt / PySide. The main purpose is to simplify software installation and debugging. Here’s envexp is running inside of Maya2020, next picture shows the same code running inside of Nuke.
